name: IM_GETTING_BETTER_AT_THIS
description: Win 10 Scenarios.

name: I_AM_A_CHAMPION
description: Win 50 Scenarios.

name: I_READ_YOUR_BOOK
description: Win 100 Scenarios.

name: CLOSE_ENOUGH
description: Miss the target hex with an artillery spotting round but hit a hex containing enemy units anyway.

name: CRUSH_YOUR_ENEMIES
description: Overrun and eliminate three squads at once with a vehicle.

name: EVERYDAY_HEROES
description: Have two heroes generated as part of the same attack.

name: HOUSEWARES
description: Have just Ash (or Sgt Ash) win a melee versus at least one squad.

name: I_DONT_WANT_TO_KNOW
description: Leave one of your Occupation Event markers untouched for the entire scenario, and win.

name: INDECISIVE
description: Have a leader with the Decisive skill and win the scenario without ever using it.

name: MY_DICE_ARE_NOT_LOADED
description: Win every single initiative roll in a scenario, and win the scenario.

name: OVERWHELMING_FIREPOWER
description: Do a Direct Fire attack with 10 or more Firepower.

name: RUN_AWAY
description: Successfully withdraw from a melee.

name: SHAKE_N_BAKE
description: Enter melee against a group of defenseless enemy units.

name: THAT_WAS_CLOSE
description: Eliminate a Suicide Sapper with opportunity fire.

name: THROUGH_THE_SCOPE
description: Eliminate a sniper with another sniper.

name: TIGER_ELIMINATED_SIR
description: Destroy a German armored vehicle that is NOT a Tiger.

name: WE_BROUGHT_FRIENDS
description: Reinforce an ongoing melee.

name: WELCOME_TO_NORMANDY
description: Complete a scenario from Heroes of Normandy.

name: HERO_OF_NORMANDY
description: Win 12 different Heroes of Normandy scenarios.

name: MASTER_OF_NORMANDY
description: Win 48 different Heroes of Normandy scenarios.

name: BOSOM_BUDDIES
description: Succesfully rally 5 or more units with Major Tom in one scenario.

name: BREAKAWAY
description: Have Lt. Clarkson successfully withdraw from a melee.

name: DR_WATSON
description: Heal a wounded Lord Holmes with a medic.

name: FURY
description: Destroy a Tiger tank with the main gun of a Sherman tank.

name: I_MEANT_TO_DO_THAT
description: Land a glider on top of enemy units.

name: IT_SCHRECKS_PANZERS
description: Destroy an armored vehicle with an RPzB54.

name: IT_WERFS_FLAMMEN
description: Cause units to retreat from a German flamethrower attack.

name: LIVINGSTON_I_PRESUME
description: Successfully Spot Sgt. Livingston.

name: MISSION_IMPOSSIBLE
description: As the Germans, win the scenario Attack of the Kochgeschirr on default or harder settings.

name: SOFT_UNDERBELLY
description: Using opportunity fire with an ordnance weapon, destroy a vehicle as it comes through bocage.

name: WELCOME_TO_THE_NAM
description: Complete a scenario from Heroes of the Nam.

name: HERO_OF_THE_NAM
description: Win 12 different Heroes of the Nam scenarios.

name: MASTER_OF_THE_NAM
description: Win 34 different Heroes of the Nam scenarios.

name: AIR_ASSAULT
description: Unload 4 or more squads from helicopters in a single turn.

name: ANZAC_ATTACK
description: As the ANZAC player, eliminate all enemies in a melee where you are outnumbered.

name: DIDNT_SAVE_HIM
description: Eliminate Lt. Ryan (or Ryan) 10 times (either side, any number of scenarios).

name: KABOOM
description: Set off three or more claymores in a single impulse.

name: LONG_SHOT
description: Cause casualties with a Sniper at a range of 9 or more hexes.

name: PVT_GUMP
description: Move a US Army Hero 6 hexes on foot in 3 consecutive turns.

name: SLAM_DUNK
description: Use three squads to eliminate Sgt. Dunk in melee.

name: SUCCESSFUL_AMBUSH
description: Eliminate all enemies in the first round of an Ambush melee.

name: TERRIBLE_ADVICE
description: Eliminate an Advisor in melee combat.

name: THIS_IS_MY_BIBLE
description: Successfully rally with a Chaplain.

name: WELCOME_TO_LIBYA
description: Complete a scenario from Days of Villainy.

name: SPREAD_OUT
description: At the end of an impulse, have six or more MMC or SMC counters alone in their hexes.

name: TECHNICALLY_PERFECT
description: Win a scenario without losing any of your Technicals.

name: OVERKILL
description: Destroy an unarmored vehicle with an ordnance weapon that has a Penetration value of 4 or more.

name: BEATING_THE_ODDS
description: In the On the Road to Sirte scenario, transport Salem over four or more offroad hexes without killing him.

name: ALTERNATE_TIMELINE
description: Win the Game Over scenario as the Loyalist side.

name: WELCOME_TO_WWIII
description: Complete a scenario from Heroes Against the Red Star

name: HERO_OF_WWIII
description: Win 11 different Heroes Against the Red Star scenarios.

name: MASTER_OF_WWIII
description: Win 33 different Heroes Against the Red Star scenarios.

name: TITANIUM_BATHTUB
description: Have an A-10 Thunderbolt II survive being struck by anti-aircraft fire.

name: FIGHT_OR_DIE
description: Successfully rally a Shaken unit with Fight or Die.

name: STRAFING_RUN
description: Attack 3 or more hexes with a single airstrike.

name: LIVE_WIRE
description: Cause an ATGM shot to be interrupted with opportunity fire.

name: DAY_OF_GLORY
description: Use the La Marseillaise skill to attempt to rally units that failed their first rally attempt this impulse.

name: MODERN_ARMOR
description: Have a vehicle survive a hit by a HEAT weapon only because of its red armor values.

name: WELCOME_TO_THE_FALKLANDS
description: Complete a scenario from Heroes of the Falklands.

name: HERO_OF_THE_FALKLANDS
description: Win 12 different Heroes of the Falklands scenarios.

name: MASTER_OF_THE_FALKLANDS
description: Win 25 different Heroes of the Falklands scenarios.

name: BUNKER_BUSTER
description: Using an ordnance weapon, satchel charge, or flamethrower, cause casualties to units inside of a bunker.

name: HIGHER_GROUND
description: Avoid a Damage Check due to the Higher Elevation penalty.

name: IM_NOT_DEAD_YET
description: Have a wounded Hero be the sole survivor of a Melee.

name: MOTIVATION_CONFIRMED
description: Successfully self-rally with an SRP unit.

name: NO_HIDING
description: Win a scenario without placing any optional bunkers in Setup.

name: SHOOTING_THE_SHIP
description: Make an enemy Ship unit withdraw from the scenario.

name: STAYING_POWER
description: Succesfully rally 3 or more units with Captain Mercury in one scenario.

name: WELCOME_TO_THE_BLITZKRIEG
description: Complete a scenario from Heroes in Defiance

name: HERO_OF_THE_BLITZKRIEG
description: Win 11 different Heroes in Defiance scenarios.

name: MASTER_OF_THE_BLITZKRIEG
description: Win 33 different Heroes in Defiance scenarios.

name: ARMOR_PIERCER
description: Destroy an armored vehicle by using a sniper rifle or machine gun.

name: BOAT_TOUR
description: Have a unit move at least four or more hexes on water using a Rubber Boat.

name: EVERYBODY_OFF
description: Dismount two or more mounted units at the same time.

name: HITTING_AND_RUNNING
description: Using Hit & Run movement, move at least two hexes, fire, and then move at least two more hexes, all in the same impulse.

name: FUNDAMENTALLY_DEFECTIVE
description: Have at least three weapon jams in one scenario.

name: LT_VON_MATILDA
description: Use Lt. von Martial to lead a Close Assault that destroys a Matilda tank.

name: TO_THE_BARRICADES
description: Destroy a Barricade.

name: WELCOME_TO_THE_PACIFIC
description: Complete a scenario from Heroes of the Pacific.

name: HERO_OF_THE_PACIFIC
description: Win 12 different Heroes of the Pacific scenarios.

name: MASTER_OF_THE_PACIFIC
description: Win 21 different Heroes of the Pacific scenarios.

name: BANZAI_DENIED
description: Use Opportunity Fire to eliminate a unit doing a Banzai attack.

name: BLOOD_IN_THE_WATER
description: Sink an opponent’s amphibious transport that is carrying passengers.

name: BURIED_ALIVE
description: Eliminate enemy units by collapsing all cave entrances.

name: CAVE_COLLAPSER
description: Collapse a cave entrance.

name: HUMAN_WAVE
description: Initiate a Banzai attack with 9 or more participants.

name: TUNNEL_RATS
description: Move units 6 or more hexes through tunnels in a single scenario.

name: WARRIOR_SPIRIT
description: Use the Warrior Spirit skill to cancel a Damage Check of 6 or more.

name: WELCOME_TO_THE_RHINE
description: Complete a scenario from Battles to the Rhine.

name: FIREBUG
description: Cause eight or more fires to start in a single scenario.

name: HOLDING_TO_THE_END
description: Have a Good Order unit make a Morale Check to remain in a Fire 1 hex.

name: RHINESTONE_COWBOY
description: As the Americans, win the Cowboy Up! scenario by the end of Turn 7 on default or harder settings.

name: SMOKE_EM_OUT
description: Use up all of your vehicle smoke supply in a scenario.

name: WILLIE_PETE
description: Fire white phosphorus into a building, bunker, or cave containing enemy units.

name: UNKNOWN_TERRITORY
description: Complete a scenario created by the Battle Generator.

name: FINAL_VICTORY
description: Win a campaign created by the Battle Generator.

name: ART_OF_WAR
description: Complete a Custom Scenario downloaded from the Steam Workshop.

name: MAXXED_OUT
description: Have a Campaign Leader increase their stats to Morale 8 and Leadership 2.

name: SURVIVOR_TYPE
description: Complete a Battle Generator campaign without your Campaign Leader ever being eliminated from a scenario.

name: STILL_DANGEROUS
description: In the Do Not Go Gentle scenario, destroy an enemy vehicle with the Tiger or b1 Bis tank.

name: WELCOME_TO_NORTH_AFRICA
description: Complete a scenario from Heroes of North Africa

name: HERO_OF_NORTH_AFRICA
description: Win 13 different Heroes of North Africa scenarios.

name: CHAMPION_OF_NORTH_AFRICA
description: Win 21 different Heroes of North Africa scenarios.

name: FIAT
description: As the Italians, Bog Down three or more times in a single scenario.

name: HABOOB
description: Have 24 or more Dust counters on the board at one time.

name: ONWARDS_SAVOY
description: Use the Avanti Savoia skill to attempt to rally units that failed their first rally attempt this impulse.

name: SBADATO
description: As the Italians, have a unit marked with a Low Ammo counter on the first turn of the scenario.

name: STIFF_UPPER_LIP
description: Receive a No Effect result on a Damage Check as a result of the Stiff Upper Lip skill.

name: TANK_KILLER
description: Destroy an enemy vehicle in Close Assault with a unit with the Tank Killer skill.

name: UNDERRATED
description: As the Italians, receive the Unpredictable bonus twice or more in one scenario.

name: WELCOME_TO_THE_MOTHERLAND
description: Complete a scenario from Heroes of the Motherland.

name: HERO_OF_THE_MOTHERLAND
description: Win 10 different Heroes of the Motherland scenarios.

name: CHAMPION_OF_THE_MOTHERLAND
description: Win 34 different Heroes of the Motherland scenarios.

name: EXPLOSION
description: Cause a critical hit on an armored vehicle.

name: FOR_THE_MOTHERLAND
description: Use the For the Motherland ability in a hex with four or more Shaken units.

name: GUN_STILL_WORKS
description: Using the gun on a vehicle with a Mobility Destroyed marker, destroy another armored vehicle.

name: INVULNERABLE
description: Have an armored vehicle struck five or more times by ordnance attacks and not be destroyed.

name: MAKING_DO
description: Have a Partisan unit use a non-Partisan Support Weapon in combat.

name: MASSIVE_WRECKAGE
description: Destroy 10 or more armored vehicles in a single scenario.

name: YOU_HAVE_TO_BE_KIDDING_ME
displayName: You Have to Be Kidding Me
description: Hit an armored vehicle and roll a penetration minus armor result of 10 or more, and not destroy it.

name: WELCOME_TO_THE_VOLGA
description: Complete a scenario from Heroes of the Bitter Harvest.

name: HERO_OF_THE_VOLGA
description: Win 12 different Heroes of the Bitter Harvest scenarios.

name: CHAMPION_OF_THE_VOLGA
description: Win 20 different Heroes of the Bitter Harvest scenarios.

name: ACE_OF_ACES
description: Have an Armor Leader destroy 5 or more vehicles in a scenario.

name: CIRCLE_OF_DEATH
description: Destroy multiple armored vehicles with Il-2 airstrikes in a scenario.

name: COMPETENT_INCOMPETENCE
description: Have an Incompetent Leader rally 3 or more Shaken units in a scenario.

name: DEDICATED
description: Use the Dedicated ability to rally a unit that would otherwise not be able to make the attempt.

name: FIGHT_TO_THE_LAST
description: Use the NKVD ability to reduce rather than Shake a squad.

name: ORDER_OF_LENIN
description: Have a Soviet or Guards Hero singlehandedly Close Assault and destroy an enemy armored vehicle.

name: WAGON_TRAIN
description: Have a Tachanka wagon team survive a scenario.
